ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A Product_specification identifies a Product or a set of Products in a Product_class by a list of Specifications.
1 - The actual set of Specification objects for a Product_specification are obtained by the union of 'defining_specifications' and of the Specification objects related to the 'associated_product_class' through a Class_specification_association or a Class_condition_association with association_type 'identification'. 2 - The specification of a Product_specification may be incomplete: there may not be in 'defining_specification' any instance of Specification for some Specification_category declared as mandatory for the 'associated_product_class'. For these Specification_category objects any Specification available in the context of the 'associated_product_class' is considered as valid for the manufacturing of the product characterized by the considered Product_specification.
If the colour is not specified for a given product family, the specified product resulting from the realization of a Product_specification associated to the Product_class representing the product family may be without paint or painted in any available colour.
The id specifies the identifier of the Product_specification.

The version_id specifies the identification of a particular version of a Product_specification.
The version_id need not be specified for a particular Product_specification.

The name specifies the word or group of words by which the Product_specification is referred to.
The name need not be specified for a particular Product_specification.
If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the name for a Product_specification.
The containing_class specifies the Product_class that a product belongs to.
The defining_specification specifies the set of Specification objects necessary to discriminate the Product_specification within its Product_class.

The description specifies additional information about the Product_specification
The description need not be specified for a particular Product_specification. If present, there shall be exactly one object that defines the description for a Product_specification.
